about_the_game:
1.Overview


Azure '88 is a 2D platform game based on fast-paced movement. The objective of the game is to clear levels quickly by utilizing roller skates to grind on various city railings and obstacles, or by using sliding, double jumping, dashing, etc.

look (GamePlay):


Players must navigate obstacles and collect bolts scattered throughout the levels using various movement options to finish the stages within a short period. As the game progresses, more abilities and obstacles will be added, making the game more complex.

While many desired systems are still missing from the current game demo, various types of player move sets, obstacles, and special tiles are prepared.

3.Player Move set types:


  • Rail Grind (ability to ride on city railings, obstacles, etc., to increase speed)
  • Side Dash (ability to gather energy while rail grinding and release speed rapidly in mid-air)
  • Down Dash (similar to Side Dash, gathers energy to descend rapidly from mid-air to ground)
  • Down Boost (landing on city railings, obstacles, etc., after Down Dash increases the player's maximum speed for a few seconds)
  • Sliding
  • Double Jump, etc.
  • (more to be added)

Types of obstacles and special tiles:



  • Regular Spikes
  • Boost Tiles
  • Deboost Tiles
  • Trap Spikes
  • Vehicle Tiles (temporarily lifts the player into the air)
  • Electric Tiles
  • Laser obstacles
  • Hill Tiles
  • Obstacles representing various city elements (trash cans, vending machines, ice cream cones, etc.)
  • (more to be added)

5.Basic story (Planned):

Azure '88 unfolds its story on Earth in the year 2088. In the 2030s, due to continuous environmental pollution and natural disasters, humanity decides to seek a better life by migrating to Mars. Consequently, only a small portion of the population remains on Earth, unable to afford the migration costs, leading to the halt of all major industrial activities on the planet. As a result, the environment gradually begins to recover. However, with most of the population and infrastructure moving to Mars, Earth becomes increasingly marginalized, and society begins to succumb to corruption. Left neglected like citizens of third world countries, Earth's inhabitants yearn for the stable future and advanced technology present on Mars. In this scenario, the space shuttle "Oriental Express," bound for Mars every ten years, becomes their beacon of hope.

Against this vast backdrop, the story of high school student "Hana" begins. Dreaming of a better future, "Hana" seizes the opportunity to secretly board the cargo hold of the "Oriental Express." However, this opportunity comes at a cost and must be paid for.

The game follows protagonist "Hana" on a journey to collect the money she owes to a broker by undertaking risky temporary jobs delivering goods across abandoned cities. "Hana" must raise the required funds within a specific timeframe.

The story revolves around the courage of a young girl venturing to find hope amidst a desolate Earth, exploring themes of societal corruption, environmental issues, human resilience, and hope. Azure '88 goes beyond being a simple game, posing deep reflections and questions about illegal immigration.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Azure '88 is a fast-paced 2D platformer game with a roller-skating-based movement system. Explore the economically and socially broken Earth in the year 2088, where our main protagonist desperately wants to escape by getting into a space shuttle to prosperous Mars that leaves once a decade.
